article_title: Christmas Memorial Lights Boards available again this year through DDI
article_text:
Print Email Font Resize Font Resize Christmas Memorial Lights Boards available again this year through DDI





The ceremony will be on Saturday, Dec. 7 on the Old Town Holiday Lane with refreshments in the Old Town Museum.



Boards will be purchased individually, designed and put up by DDI as a fundraiser for their organization. DDI welcomes your ideas for art work, design, concept and wording as they create your Memorial Board.



Pick up a copy of The Record for the full story.

















These will be displayed during the Christmas Holiday Season on the Old Town Holiday Lane (South 14th Street).The ceremony will be on Saturday, Dec. 7 on the Old Town Holiday Lane with refreshments in the Old Town Museum.Boards will be purchased individually, designed and put up by DDI as a fundraiser for their organization. DDI welcomes your ideas for art work, design, concept and wording as they create your Memorial Board.Pick up a copy of The Record for the full story.

article_metadata.description: Theta Delta Beta Sigma Phi Sorority will again partner with DDI to assist in designing "Memorial Boards" in honor of loved ones throughout the community.
